articles.content: Rupali Ganguly and Gaurav Khanna starrer Anupamaa is getting all the attention. The show has been on the top of the TRP charts. Yesterday, we all got a shocking news when Aashish Mehrotra announced h… [+2206 chars]

articles.title: Indian-origin Miss Teen USA UmaSofia Srivastava gives up title: ‘values don’t align with... - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Miss Teen USA 2023 UmaSofia Srivastava has decided to give up her title. Srivastava resigned saying her personal values no longer aligned with the organisation.
articles.content: UmaSofia Srivastava, who was crowned Miss Teen USA 2023, has given up her title two days after Miss USA 2023 Noelia Voigt did the same. In a note shared on Instagram, Srivastava said her personal val… [+1862 chars]

articles.title: Idols' MET Gala Attendance Points To The "Problem" With K-Pop - Koreaboo
articles.description: BLACKPINK Jennie and Stray Kids' appearances at the "2024 MET Gala," triggered discussions over an ongoing "problem" in K-Pop.
